title: Алекс и Белла Шерр
author: Savitskaya Alla
description:
This artpiece is done with oil on canvas. 'Alex and Bella Sherr' is related to realism being a representative of portraits genre. The interesting fact about this painting is that it seems to be "wierd", still only a few can bypass it without noticing. 

This artwork took part in several art festivals and exhibitions approved by corresponding certificates and galleries art catalogues.

Pay attention: Upon buying the digitalized copy of this masterpiece in Ultra HD 1:1 resolution, you will receive the original physical Authentic Painting.
